page.title: 13DAY IN THE LIFE OF A 9YR OLD
page.content: I wake up at 7.30. I{wash}my face and {eat}cornflakes and toast.After breakfast I go to{school}with my friend.The school bell is rung at 8.55.After registration I go to Assembly with my class until 9.30.Our Head tells us a story.If you have a birthday you get a sweet.I do maths until playtime which lasts 15 minutes.Then I go to the Library.I do topic or language work until 12.00.My school dinner costs 57p a day .I usually have a salad with two potatoes followed by sweet and a drink of water.On some afternoons we have games girls netball,boys football.After games I do art or craft work and go home at 3.15. I{play}out on my bike with my friends or{watch TV.}I have my tea at 6.00.with my family.After tea I watch more T.V. until it is{bedtime at 8.30 I{read}for 15 minutes in bed.
